body:
Create Procedure $CURSOR$
(


/* Rapor yazdÄ±rma */
@IsRaporExec int Output, @EXCRaporShowDialog tinyint Output, @EXCRaporOutPutType tinyint Output, @EXCRaporFieldValue varchar(100) Output,
@EXCRaporID int Output, @EXCRaporFieldName varchar(100) Output, @EXCRaporFilterName varchar(100) Output)
As
Set NoCount On
Begin 
    Begin Try
        



		If @EXCRaporOutPutType = 1 Set @IsRaporExec = 1
		Set @EXCRaporID = 1487
        Set @EXCRaporFieldName = 'IsEmriNo'
        Set @EXCRaporFilterName = 'in'
        Set @EXCRaporFieldValue = @IsEmriNo
        Set @EXCRaporShowDialog = 0

    End Try 
    Begin Catch	
        Declare @ITObjectName nVarchar(126);
        Set @ITObjectName = Object_Name(@@PROCID);
        Execute SP15_GenerateError @ITObjectName;
    End Catch
End
Go
